text: By Reason of Insanity is a two-part 2015 BBC documentary by Louis Theroux. It focuses on the lives of mental patients at two of Ohio's state psychiatric hospitals Twin Valley Behavioral Healthcare and Summit Behavioral Healthcare who have been sent there after committing crimes but having been acquitted by reason of insanity. ==See also== * List of Louis Theroux documentaries ==References== ==External links== *By Reason of Insanity (programme page on the BBC website) * Category:2015 in British television Category:BBC television documentaries Category:Louis Theroux's BBC Two specials Category:Television shows set in Ohio Category:Films set in psychiatric hospitals Category:Documentary films about forensic psychiatry Category:BBC travel television series
title: By Reason of Insanity
